headline: Revvity to Present at J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., December 18, 2025--Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY) will present at the 44th annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Tuesday, January 13, 2026 at 9:45 a.m. PT.

headline: 3 Reasons RVTY is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Revvity currently trades at $96.77 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 2.5%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 13.6% gain during that period.
